name: nxus-users
description: User management module for Nxus apps.

scripts.postversion: npm run build-docs && git push && git push --tags
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test mocha --compilers js:babel-register -R spec test/*.js src/modules/**/test/*.js
scripts.compile: babel src --out-dir lib; npm run copyTemplates
scripts.copyTemplates: for each in `ls src/modules/`; do if [ -d src/modules/$each/templates ]; then cp -r src/modules/$each/templates lib/modules/$each; fi; done;
scripts.build-docs: export NAME=`npm view . name`; export VERSION=`npm view . version`; documentation readme ./src/*.js --name $NAME --project-version $VERSION --readme-file ./README.md -s $NAME
scripts.publish-docs: npm run build-docs && git add ./README.md && git commit -m 'Updated README API Docs' && git push

author: mjreich
